"Astarte": "Greetings. This is ARKS Basic Instruction Officer Astarte."
"I have recently been put in charge of a new hands-on training program, the \"<c ff4f3f>Mission Board<c>\"."
"The <c ff4f3f>Mission Board<c> is designed to help you learn about ARKS and the world by completing various tasks."
"Let's take a quick look. I'm sure that you'll understand once you've seen it."
"Open the <c ff4f3f>main menu<c>, select the \"<c ff4f3f>Quest<c>\" category, then \"<c ff4f3f>Mission Board<c>\"."
"Did you understand how to open the <c ff4f3f>Mission Board<c>?"
"Next, let's learn how to pick a \"<c ff4f3f>Mission<c>\"."
"First, go to the Quest Counter, select <c ff4f3f>Story Quests<c> and start the Quest \"<c ff4f3f>The First Matter Board<c>\"."
